description: A common set of schema definitions shared by other Brigade schemas

apiVersion.description: The major version of the Brigade API with which this object conforms

type.description: The type of principal-- USER or SERVICE_ACCOUNT

id.description: The ID of the user or service account
id.$comment: Email validation regex was taken from https://emailregex.com/ and combined with regex for validating service account IDs

timeoutDuration.description: Job timeout string expressed as a sequence of decimal numbers, each with optional fraction and a unit suffix, such as '300ms', '3.14s' or '2h45m'

gitCloneURL.description: The URL for cloning a git project

gitRef.description: A reference to a git branch or tag
